title: The Best Weekend Sales, According To R29 Shopping Editors
description: As professional online shoppers, Refinery29 Most Wanted writers have a spidey sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time offers. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands, where there's a clearance rack, there's an R29 shopping editor ready to size up its price-slashed goods. Today, we bring you the best sales happening this weekend. Gird your loins — err, wallets. The deals on this list must meet at least one of the following criteria: The discount is applied to a Refinery29 reader-favorite item (according to our anonymous shopping data), it takes a minimum of 20% off the full price, or it's an item that's rarely discounted, making even a slight price cut worth noting. The following sales are ones to watch and worthy of a spot in all budget-friendly carts — at least, in our opinion.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.MangoOne thing that’s certainly brightening up our winter blues: Mango’s new season sale, with offers of up to 70% off.Mango Parka With Contrasting Collar and Pockets, $, available at MangoBéisGet excited, Béis is holding a rare virtual warehouse sale this weekend. Up to 40% off from February 19th until the 23rd — it’s the perfect opportunity to upgrade your tired, old luggage before vacation season. Béis The Carry-On Roller in Atlas Pink, $, available at BéisFree PeopleThis weekend, Free People’s spring sale is packed with new-season goodies. We’re eyeing floaty, floral dresses that can easily be dressed up for spring weddings.Louise New York Camille Dress, $, available at Free PeopleMadewellWe're total suckers for a Madewell deal. This weekend, score up to 70% off across hundreds of styles. We’ll be stocking up on one closet staple: the brand’s bestselling cotton crewneck tee. The perfect fit — just above high-waisted jeans — and made from thick, soft, luxurious cotton.Madewell Cotton Perfect Crewneck Tee, $, available at MadewellAbercrombie & FitchIn need of a spring wardrobe refresh? Abercrombie & Fitch’s clearance sale is on, with hundreds of discounts. We're going for tailored workwear, layerable knits, and dream-fit denim.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love High Rise Wide Leg Jean, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchCarawayIn need of a kitchen refresh? This weekend, Caraway is offering savings on its kitchenware bundles, including this food storage set, of which one of these freezer-, microwave-, and oven-safe ceramic containers made its way into our most recent Most Valued Products series.Caraway Food Storage Set, $, available at CarawayLululemonLululemon nails the trifecta of softness, style, and support, which is why we’re always lurking in its We Made Too Much section. Right now, we’ve got our eye on these pants — polished enough for work and comfy enough for a lunchtime stroll.Lululemon Smooth Fit Pull-On High-Rise Pant Regular, $, available at LululemonMeshki Summer vacation already on the brain? You’re in luck — Meshki’s new season sale is packed with sun-ready pieces, like simple yet stunning linen dresses.Meshki Audrina Strapless Linen Maxi Dress, $, available at MeshkiEverlaneEverlane’s sale is a must-shop, with up to 75% off top-quality staples like workwear separates, quilted jackets, and plush knits.Everlane The Dream Trouser, $, available at EverlaneAnthropologieThis R29 reader-favorite retailer has a sale section packed with gems at unbeatable prices. For a limited time, take up to 40% off select clothing, accessories, homeware, and beauty products. At top of our list is a reader and R29 editor-favorite piece: the Somerset Maxi Dress — dubbed “THE dress of the summer”. The Somerset Collection by Anthropologie The Somerset Maxi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieNordstromThe Nordstrom sale isn’t over just yet. Score up to 60% off on brands like Jenny Bird, Dolce Vita, Mulberry, and more. We’ve got our eye on Dolce Vita’s bestselling Auggie knee-high boots — one of our Fashion Director’s essentials for building a capsule closet.Dolce Vita Auggie Pointed Toe Knee High Boot, $, available at NordstromNordstrom RackNordstrom Rack always has some great deals, such as Dyson products starting at $200.
